title.narrative: SECONDARY EDUCATION AND EXCLUSION

description.narrative: Para el 2024, los y las adolescentes acceden a servicios educativos, con enfoque inclusivo, pertinentes y de calidad, que aseguren trayectorias exitosas, en especial en zonas con mayor vulnerabilidad., which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Access To Quality Learning Opportunities (Covid), Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: . description.narrative: UNICEF contributed to continuity of education by technically assisting government and schools in the safe-return-to-school operations, as well as increased CSO’s and communities’ capacities to address adolescent educational exclusion. Additionally, UNICEF’s technical assistance to the consultation process for the educational policy reform contributed to the inclusion of the intercultural perspective in key policy lines.; | Status:Met | As-of Date:11/01/2022
